message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe will be incredibly valuable to your business. While I can't disclose specific details at this time, I can tell you it's worth at least $1,500,000 to you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1,200,000. This is a significant discount, and I believe it's a deal you won't want to miss. Let me know your thoughts.
